resume.title: Resume
resume.summary_content: I am a full stack developer with experience developing for web and mobile technologies. Currently I am in preparing my first native App for both Android and iOS with Android Wear and Apple WatchKit integrations. I have a diverse career and academic background with a great emphasis on Life Sciences. There are many resources I used to keep current with emerging technologies: Github, StackoverFlow & Code School.

e12.title: App Developer
e12.durration: Roswell Studios, March 2015 – Present, New York, NY

e11.title: Web Developer
e11.durration: The Lathe, March 2011 – January 2015 (4 years 10 months) New York, NY
e11.description: Designing and updating web, mobile web and mobile apps using the following technologies: Servers (ASP.NET, PHP, Tomcat, Java, Spring Framework, NODEJS), DBs (Oracle, MySQL, SQL Server, MongoDB), Mobile apps (iOS), web development (CSS3, HTML5, jQuery). Experience with responsive web design and fallback development for legacy (IE) browsers. Experience with UI/UX design process.

e10.title: Developer/DBA
e10.durration: Apparently, Inc March 2012 – June 2013 (1 year 4 months) New York, NY
e10.description: Developing iOS Webkit modules using Jade, Stylus, client side Javascript and server side NodeJS Javascripting. Administrating and generating reports on MongoDB.

e9.title: Web Developer
e9.durration: Villas by Linda Smith September 2010 – March 2011 (7 months)

e8.title: Helpdesk Supervisor
e8.durration: The National Academies August 2004 – March 2010 (5 years 8 months) Washington, DC
e8.description: Technolgoy support, training, reporting and management

e7.title: Internship
e7.durration: Jane Goodall Institute August 2003 – December 2003 (5 months)
e7.description: Managing the membership access database. Reporting on Raiser's Edge Oracle database. Providing customer service to program members. Developing GIS component to system.

e6.title: 10gen (the MongoDB company)
e6.description: Learned how to use MongoDB in the context of application development Certificate

e5.title: American University
e5.durration: Science Masters; Applied Sciences degree focused; Bachelors, Biotechnology 2004 – 2006
e5.description: Simulations, Informatics & Analytics, Environmental Ethics, Bioinformatics, Molecular Genetics. Emphasis in group projects and collaboration.

e3.title: Web Development
e3.description: AngularJS, NodeJS, MongoDB, Yeoman, Grunt, Bower, Foundation, Bootstrap, JQuery, CSS3

e2.title: Mobile App Development
e2.description: iOS (Objective-C, WatchKit), Android (Java, Android Wear SDK), PhoneGap
